snippet: There had been hopes that President Ali Abdullah Saleh’s departure might ease antigovernment protests.
abstract: Yemen's Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh reverses decision to travel to the United States for medical treatment; he cites escalating turmoil at home.
lead_paragraph: There had been hopes that President Ali Abdullah Saleh’s departure might ease antigovernment protests.

headline.seo: Yemen President, Saleh, Won’t Leave Country
headline.main: In a Shift, the President of Yemen Will Stay Put
headline.print_headline: In a Shift, The President Of Yemen Will Stay Put
